attributes.action: Block a second Referendum on the membership of the European Union
attributes.additional_details:
The EU made Ireland have a second referendum after they initially rejected the Lisbon treaty 
The same happened to Denmark over the Maastricht treaty.
For the sake of democracy David Cameron, Stepped down and said the Government would honour and respect the peoples wishes, And a new Prime minister Would activate article 50.
As a nation we do not get to demand an instant revote upon a General election being called, If the wrong party wins. Members of Parliament should honour our initial vote.
attributes.background:
The entire United Kingdom held a referendum to decide,Whether or not we should remain a member of the European union.
Upon Leave getting the victory Remain has set up a petition to force a second referendum.Upon the whole nation after the Government clearly stated,This was a once in a lifetime vote
